mapper.select: select TABLE_NAME as tableName, TABLE_SCHEMA as dbName, TABLE_COMMENT as tableComment, TABLE_ROWS as tableRows, AVG_ROW_LENGTH as avgRowLength, DATA_LENGTH as dataLength, MAX_DATA_LENGTH as maxDataLength, TABLE_COLLATION as tableCharset, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA=(select database())

select COLUMN_NAME as columnName, COLUMN_KEY as columnKey, TABLE_SCHEMA as dbName, TABLE_NAME as tableName, COLUMN_KEY as columnKey, COLUMN_COMMENT as columnComment, COLUMN_TYPE as columnType, DATA_TYPE as dataType, EXTRA as extra from information_schema.COLUMNS where TABLE_SCHEMA = (select database()) and TABLE_NAME=#{tableName}
